sources.title: Girl On The Run (1953) Steve McQueen, Richard Coogan, Frank Albertson - Film Noir Full Movie
sources.description: Girl On The Run is a 1953 ultra-low budget independent production drops a standard crime melodrama into the noirish, tawdry world of a carnival burlesque show. Featuring Steve McQueen, Richard Coogan, Frank Albertson. The most notable cast member of Girl On The Run has one of the smallest roles: Steve McQueen, seen in the background of two scenes during his first known film role. It also inspired the hit Indian Hindi film Caravan starring Asha Parekh. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Girl_on_the_Run_(1953_film) Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.

sources.title: Girl on the Run (1953) SEEDY CRIME NOIR
sources.description:
Stars: Richard Coogan, Rosemary Pettit, Frank Albertson
Writer/Director: Arthur J. Beckhard

When a reporter is framed for the murder of his boss, he and his girl go on the run. They hide out at the carnival freak show where the killing occurred to find the true villains and clear his name ! See if you can spot STEVE McQUEEN in his first screen appearance!

TRIVIA: Richard Coogan is best known for originating the lead role for the 1950s TV series Captain Video and His Video Rangers, the first Science Fiction series on American television.

metadata.Plot: Bill Martin, a reporter falsely accused of murder, takes refuge at a traveling carnival. Janet his girlfriend, is forced to hide out with him as the "new fish" in the chorus line of carnival strippers, and becomes the defacto "Girl On The Run."
metadata.Actors: Richard Coogan, Rosemary Pettit, Frank Albertson
